message.content:
cs.CL, cs.SD, cs.SI, cs.LG, cs.AI 

Reasoning: 
- cs.CL (Computation and Language) is the most likely category as the paper deals with natural language processing tasks such as topic identification on spoken segments. 
- cs.SD (Sound) is also a possible category as the paper deals with unstructured audio data. 
- cs.SI (Social and Information Networks) is another possible category as the paper deals with contextual dependencies across sequential segments. 
- cs.LG (Machine Learning) is a possible category as the paper proposes an attention-based contextual model. 
- cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) is also a possible category as the paper deals with developing a general purpose method for topic identification on spoken segments.
